cellmate.extractor
Class CellReflector

Object
  CellReflector

@Beta
public final class CellReflector
extends Object

Class CellReflector Collection of static methods to inspect Class instances that have been annotated with Cell and read their contents.

This requires the class have annotated Cell and Label and Value

The auxiliary methods require the class has one or more fields annotated with CellAuxilaryField

Method Detail

getLabelAsString

public static String getLabelAsString(Object obj)
                               throws CellExtractorException
Looks at any arbitrary cell class and returns the String representation of the label, or throws an error if malformed, missing annotation, or null.

Parameters:
obj - cell to read the label.
Returns:
String label
Throws:
CellExtractorException - if any parsing error occurs while reading the field.

getValueAsString

public static String getValueAsString(Object obj)
                               throws CellExtractorException
Looks at any arbitrary cell class and expects to return a String value. The class will throw a CellExtractionException if the object if any of the following conditions occur 1) obj is missing the Cell annotation 2) obj is missing the Value annotation on a field of type String. 3) The obj has the Value annotation on a field type that cannot be cast to String. 4) Value is null.

Parameters:
obj - cell to read String value
Returns:
String value
Throws:
CellExtractorException - if ClassCastException, missing annotations or null value.

getAuxiliaryValue

public static <T> T getAuxiliaryValue(Class<T> clazz,
                                      Object obj,
                                      String name)
                           throws CellExtractorException
Looks at any arbitrary cell class and expects to find a value for some field annotated with CellAuxiliaryType with a matching name attribute.

Type Parameters:
T - auxiliary field type.
Parameters:
clazz - Auxiliary field class of type T
obj - cell instance
name - auxiliary name attribute to find.
Returns:
Auxiliary value instance for the given cell.
Throws:
CellExtractorException - if ClassCastException, missing CellAuxiliaryAnnotation, or null value.

hasNamedAuxiliaryField

public static boolean hasNamedAuxiliaryField(Object obj,
                                             String name)
                                      throws CellExtractorException
Check to see if the given cell object has an CellAuxiliaryField with the given name.

Parameters:
obj - cell to check
name - name to find.
Returns:
true or false if the cell has the auxiliary name.
Throws:
CellExtractorException - if ClassCastException, missing CellAuxiliaryAnnotation, or null value.

getColFam

public static String getColFam(Object cell)
                        throws CellExtractorException
Retrieve the column family value from any arbitrary cell with the ColumnFamily annotation. The class will throw a CellExtractionException if the object if any of the following conditions occur 1) obj is missing the Cell annotation 2) obj is missing the ColumnFamily annotation on a field of type T. 3) The obj has the Value annotation on a field type that cannot be cast to T. 4) Value is null.

Parameters:
cell -
Returns:
String colfam
Throws:
CellExtractorException - if missing ColumnFamily annotation or the field is null.

hasColFamField

public static boolean hasColFamField(Object cell)
                              throws CellExtractorException
Check to see if a given object has a field annotated with ColumnFamily. See ColumnFamily

Parameters:
cell - to check
Returns:
true/false if the ColumnFamily annotation is present.
Throws:
CellExtractorException

getValueBytesIfPrimative

public static byte[] getValueBytesIfPrimative(Object cell)
                                       throws CellExtractorException
Produce a byte array if the provided class contains an Annotated Value and that value can be treated as either a String, long, double, int, or byte[].

Parameters:
cell - to read field value as bytes
Returns:
byte contents of the value.
Throws:
CellExtractorException - if the Value type does not match the five main fields, an illegal argument is found, or the value is null.

getValueType

public static Class<?> getValueType(Object obj)
                             throws CellExtractorException
Get the class instance representing the annotated Value field in the supplied cell instance.

Parameters:
obj - cell instance to get value type
Returns:
Class of value type.
Throws:
CellExtractorException - if obj is not annoated as Cell

                           throws CellExtractorException
Get the label field for a given cell, if present.

Parameters:
obj - cell to get label field
Returns:
Field annotated with Label
Throws:
CellExtractorException - if obj is not annotated as Cell or multiple fields are annoted with Label
